segments.text: What do you think are the main causes of war today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d say the main reason is poverty . Countries and their people get frustrated because they have so little . If their neighbors have some resources , they try to steal them by military force .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems that a lot of wars nowadays are really civil wars . People from different ethnic groups in the same country sometimes fight for power in that country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: several of those civil wars have been going on for years and years . It seems they will never end .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you think they could be ended ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t think that there is any easy way . The united nations could send peacekeepers into the country . At least then the warring parties could be forced to negotiate . The thing is to find the real pro
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , if the cause is poverty , there should be a programme to make the country richer . If the problem is resources , share them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds easy when you say it like that . In reality , it ’ s harder to make peace between countries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It is . One way to stop countries fighting is to cut off their financial support . Wars are very expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The problem is that many poor people might suffer .
segments.speaker: S2
